# zane-current-time

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Overview

当前时间显示组件

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `timezone` | `timezone` | 时区设置 遵循IANA时区数据库的时区字符串格式 例如: "Asia/Shanghai", "America/New_York" | `string` | `undefined` |
